author: gbrown
msg: Update Kitchen Sink demo and ScriptApplication to use new convenience launcher method in DesktopApplicationContext; update variable names in convenience launcher method for clarity.

author: jukka
msg: JCR-2094: Use an enumeration for QOM operators
Updated more test cases to use the Operator enumeration. This works around the problems caused by the incorrect QOM constants in JCR 2.0 PFD.

author: aconway
msg: Cleaned up PIMPL pattern for public API
- Separated PrivateImplRef helper classs from Handler base class.
- Consistent impl of ctor, dtor, copy, assign for all PIMPL classes.

author: antelder
msg: Tidy imports, no other code changes
